rows.label: qst202802_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, uh...
Pardon me...
Are you all right?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0002
rows.name:
Of course me not 'all right'!
Me got treated horrible!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0003
rows.name:
Incidentally, what've you been doing
in the ground there, guy?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0004
rows.name:
Me not 'guy'! That offensive!
Name is Mogumogu!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0005
rows.name:
And if friends must know, Mogumogu
do excavation here, day and night,
in search of new kind of mineral!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0006
rows.name:
Mogumogu have hunch, see? Feel deep
in bones that hereabouts, precious
stone wait to be found...

rows.label: qst202802_msg0007
rows.name:
Unfortunately, tunnel sort of collapse,
and Mogumogu get buried alive.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0008
rows.name:
But friends re-excavate Mogumogu!
Mogumogu grateful!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0009
rows.name:
Not at all.
It was a happy accident, really...

rows.label: qst202802_msg0010
rows.name:
Back up a bit though.
You said you were looking for
a new mineral?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0011
rows.name: Indeed!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0012
rows.name: This area have lots of precious stone.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0013
rows.name:
Not only that, but can also find
crystallized remains of creatures
from ancient time.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0014
rows.name:
Digging up bodies sounds a bit yucky
if you ask me...

rows.label: qst202802_msg0015
rows.name: No way, there's nothing yucky about it!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0016
rows.name:
When ancient creatures' bones
turn to stone or to crystal,
they make really beautiful fossils.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0017
rows.name:
Is that right? Huh!
I had no idea.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0018
rows.name:
So, Mogumogu, what kinds of rocks
have you found so far?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0019
rows.name:
Friend want to know?
Well, now, far be it for Mogumogu to
toot own horn, but...

rows.label: qst202802_msg0020
rows.name: Me discover two new kinds of mineral.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0021
rows.name: Two new kinds?!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0022
rows.name:
Yes! Mogumogute is one,
and Himahistone is other.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0023
rows.name: Wow, those are some major minerals!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0024
rows.name: Yeah, even I've heard of Mogumogute.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0025
rows.name:
They find it here in Invidia sometimes,
right?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0026
rows.name:
Mogumogu!
I also want to discover a new mineral!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0027
rows.name:
Please! Teach me the secret of
mineral discovery!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0028
rows.name:
Hmhmhm...
Normally, Mogumogu would never
disclose secrets of art, but in this case...

rows.label: qst202802_msg0029
rows.name:
Fellow rock hunter cannot be
bad person! Also, me owe friends
my life!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0030
rows.name:
So, as exception, me will tell friends
shortcut on road to become
geologist extraordinaire.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0031
rows.name: Shortcut?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0032
rows.name:
To find rare mineral, friends can't
just look like for normal rock.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0033
rows.name:
Instead, must seek out
suspicious-looking deposits!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0034
rows.name:
That's a good point... So far I've only
looked in the most obvious places.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0035
rows.name:
Then no wonder friend find nothing!
Key is to search deposits which
nobody else think to search!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0036
rows.name:
Also one other thing. Once friend
find rare stone, must confirm mineral is
truly new discovery.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0037
rows.name:
In Avaritia Trade Guild live
jeweler name Milolo, who also
do work as appraiser on side.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0038
rows.name:
Milolo appraise minerals that
Mogumogu excavate also. Then pay
good money for said minerals.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0039
rows.name:
Milolo has eye for these things,
maybe best in all of Alst.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0040
rows.name:
Wow,okay... So to recap, to find
rare stones we should check deposits
that nobody else would check...

rows.label: qst202802_msg0041
rows.name:
and then take them to Milolo
in Avaritia for appraisal, and
that's the best way? All right.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0042
rows.name:
Discovery of new minerals is
battle against self.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0043
rows.name:
Friends cannot give up, but also
cannot rush. If friends stay true to path,
success surely follow!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0044
rows.name:
Mogumogu see great things
in future of friend Menou.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0045
rows.name:
Thanks for the vote of confidence!
I'll do my best, Master Mogumogu!

rows.label: qst202802_msg0046
rows.name:
Meheheh...
Then job of Mogumogu is done here,
and me get back to previous job.

rows.label: qst202802_msg0047
rows.name:
What say we go pay a visit
to Milolo in Avaritia?

rows.label: qst202802_msg0048
rows.name:
Sounds like a plan!
We should introduce ourselves
if we're gonna be working together.
